TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XsltArgumentList extends System.Object

summary.span: Contains a variable number of arguments which are either XSLT parameters or extension objects.

span.span: Contains a variable number of arguments which are either XSLT parameters or extension objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類別由方法。This class is used by the method. 它可讓參數和叫用從樣式表中的擴充物件。It allows parameters and extension objects to be invoked from within the style sheet. 當參數和物件會加入至，它們分別是命名空間限定的名稱和命名空間 URI 相關聯。When the parameters and objects are added to the , they are associated with a namespace qualified name and a namespace URI, respectively. 以下是將物件傳遞，而不是使用內嵌指令碼，例如優點``:The following are advantages to passing an object rather than using an embedded script such as ``: - 提供較佳的類別封裝和重複使用。Provides better encapsulation and reuse of classes. - 可讓較小且更輕鬆地維護的樣式表。Allows style sheets to be smaller and more easily maintained. - 支援傳遞節點片段 (透過) 至樣式表。Supports passing node fragments (through the ) to the style sheet. 如需使用詳細資訊，請參閱 < [XSLT 擴充物件](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xslt-extension-objects.md)並[XSLT 參數](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xslt-parameters.md)。For more information about using the , see [XSLT Extension Objects](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xslt-extension-objects.md) and [XSLT Parameters](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xslt-parameters.md).

summary.span: Adds a new object to the and associates it with the namespace URI.

span.span: Adds a new object to the and associates it with the namespace URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `params`關鍵字，以允許未指定要傳遞的參數數目，目前不支援。The `params` keyword, which allows an unspecified number of parameters to be passed, is currently not supported. 利用以定義方法的 XSLT 樣式表`params`關鍵字無法正常運作。XSLT style sheets that utilize methods defined with the `params` keyword does not work correctly. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [params](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/params.md)。For more information, see [params](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/params.md). ## Examples 在下列範例中，樣式表會將書籍價格使用 XSLT 擴充物件。In the following example, the style sheet uses an XSLT extension object to convert the book price. [!code-csharp[XsltArgumentList.AddExtensionObject#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XsltArgumentList.AddExtensionObject/CS/addextobj.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XsltArgumentList.AddExtensionObject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XsltArgumentList.AddExtensionObject/VB/addextobj.vb#1)] 此範例會使用下列的資料檔案，做為輸入。The example uses the following data files as input. `books.xml` [!code-xml[XsltArgumentList.AddExtensionObject#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XsltArgumentList.AddExtensionObject/XML/books.xml#2)] `prices.xsl` [!code-xml[XsltArgumentList.AddExtensionObject#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XsltArgumentList.AddExtensionObject/XML/prices.xsl#3)]

exception.span: The is either or http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform The already has an extension object associated with it.

span.span: The is either or http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform The already has an extension object associated with it.

exception.span: The caller does not have sufficient permissions to call this method.

span.span: The caller does not have sufficient permissions to call this method.

param.span: The namespace URI to associate with the parameter.

param.span: The parameter value or object to add to the list.

summary.span: Adds a parameter to the and associates it with the namespace qualified name.

span.span: Adds a parameter to the and associates it with the namespace qualified name.

remarks.format:
## Remarks `parameter`應該對應至 W3C 型別。The `parameter` should correspond to a W3C type. 下表顯示 W3C 型別、 XPath 或 XSLT 和 corresponding.NET 類別。The following table shows the W3C types, either XPath or XSLT, and the corresponding.NET class. |W3C 型別W3C Type|Equivalent.NET 類別 （型別）Equivalent.NET Class (Type)| |--------------|-----------------------------------| |`String` (XPath)`String` (XPath)|| |`Boolean` (XPath)`Boolean` (XPath)|| |`Number` (XPath)`Number` (XPath)|| |`Result Tree Fragment` (XSLT)`Result Tree Fragment` (XSLT)|| |`Node Set` (XPath)`Node Set` (XPath)|

`XPathNavigator[]`| |`Node`\* (XPath)`Node`\* (XPath)|| \*這相當於含有單一節點的節點集。\*This is equivalent to a node set that contains a single node. 如果正在從樣式表中叫用的參數物件不是上述其中一項，則會根據下列規則來轉換：If the parameter object being invoked from within the style sheet is not one of the above, it is converted according to the following rules: - CLR 數字類型會轉換為 。CLR numeric types are converted to . - 類型會轉換為 。The type is converted to . - 類型會轉換為 。 types are converted to . `XPathNavigator[]` 轉換成。`XPathNavigator[]` is converted to . 所有其他類型都會擲回錯誤。All other types throw an error. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法用來建立參數，代表目前的日期和時間。The following example uses the method to create a parameter representing the current date and time. [!code-csharp[XsltArgumentList.AddParam#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XsltArgumentList.AddParam/CS/addparam.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XsltArgumentList.AddParam#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XsltArgumentList.AddParam/VB/addparam.vb#1)] 此範例會使用下列的兩個資料檔案，做為輸入。The example uses the following two data files as input. `order.xml` [!code-xml[XsltArgumentList.AddParam#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XsltArgumentList.AddParam/XML/order.xml#2)] `order.xsl` [!code-xml[XsltArgumentList.AddParam#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XsltArgumentList.AddParam/XML/order.xsl#3)]

span.span: The is either or http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform.

span.span: The is not a valid name according to the W3C XML specification.

summary.span: Occurs when a message is specified in the style sheet by the xsl:message element.

span.span: Occurs when a message is specified in the style sheet by the xsl:message element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未註冊事件，所有訊息會經由管道都輸出至標準輸出。If the event is not registered, all messages are piped to standard out.
